name: Slug Journey
description:
Summary

The Ocean was poluted and you're but a frail slug. Survive by avoiding all the trash and try to clean the ocean's dirt while on your journey!

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move

F:  Inteact

Espaço:  Jump

Credits

Programmer: Gabriel Pittol

Artists: Jayhson Magnus, Ana Carolina Soares

Musics Used: 

Tales of Zestiria - Melody of Water -> (Menu, Credits)

MapleStory - Aqua Road: Shining Sea - > (Level 1)

Ori and the Blind Forest - The Waters -> Cleansed (Level 2)

Elsword - The Sunken City -> (Level 3)
